pkgmetadata.longdescription: HDF5 is a file format and library for storing scientific data. HDF5 was designed and implemented to address the deficiencies of HDF4.x. It has a more powerful and flexible data model, supports files larger than 2 GB, and supports parallel I/O.

use.flag: Enable new features that require Fortran 2003 (http://www.hdfgroup.org/HDF5/doc/fortran/NewFeatures_F2003.pdf)
